Key Match Events: Wanindu Hasaranga claimed the key wicket of Usman Ghani (27) early
Hasaranga finished with a match-winning figures of 3/13
Mujeeb produced a moment of brilliance when he clean bowled Pathum Nissanka for 10
Dhananjaya de Silva (66*) crafted a brilliant half-century to guide Sri Lanka home
Post-Match Reflections: The victory sees Sri Lanka stay in contention for an unlikely semi-final berth
Afghanistan's frustrating tournament is over, with Friday's clash against hosts Australia now their final chance to earn a victory at the T20 World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gulbadin Naib had a comical dismissal
Sri Lanka kept Afghanistan to 28/1 in the second innings Powerplay
